content.description: Long climb branching right off of geezer.
content.location: Start on geezer then break right on a pocket down low to the anchors at the apex of the cave.

content.description: This route starts left of Lefty and climbs up good holds, trending left to anchor that has one bolt on each side of a corner.

Two bouldery sequences separated by some good ole' jug hauling.

Start on a rock stack on the right side of the Big Cave, with a right hand sidepull and a high left hand. Fire through the first boulder problem to a ledge rest. Keep it together through the next boulder problem and finish at the long chain anchors (2nd set from the right, shared with Bachelor Party).
content.location: Right side of the Big Cave. Currently the second route from the right. Shares a start with Stoner Boy.

content.description:
Jugs, jugs, jugs, huge jugs. The crag warm-up. Hang on!

Stick clip the first perma-draw and start on a ledge on the far left side of the Big Cave. Continue climbing right until you reach the second set of anchors from the left (shared with Geezer).
content.location: Furthest L route in the cave.  Traverses up and right on big, flat ledges to the lip of the cave.

content.description:
Big holds and big pulls through a seemingly endless line of fixed draws. A sustained jug haul with a couple short tricky sequences thrown in the mix.

Stick clip the first draw and climb in from the left. Move up and left at the first draw. At the sixth draw, follow the draw line straight up (the draws on the left are for Grande Rouge). Rejoin Grande Rouge at the long chain draws (8th draw) and continue to the chains of Slug Bait.
content.protection: 13 fixed draws; Bolted anchor with mussy hooks.
content.location: On the right side of The Big Cave, between the starts of Grande Rouge and Hanta Virus.

content.description: Climb a short bouldery section of the blocks then up jugs and ledges. The Crux can be done on the left or the right. The guide book says 11d or 12a depending on which way you go.

content.location: Star on the 420 mark and climb up and right.
